resources.title: 24-hour/Night Offer Banner Settings
resources.exibitionTypeHelperText: How the Banner will be displayed (default, dynamic)
resources.offerTypeHelperText: What will be the variant of the Banner (isNightOffer, isTwentyFourOffer)
resources.idsHelperText: Ids of the products that will be displayed (separated by ',')
resources.exibitionImageHelperText: Product image that will be displayed (this image only appears in the 'dynamic' variant)
resources.exclusiveAppOfferBannerHelperText: Exclusive image for the APP (used to render another banner)
resources.exclusiveWebTecnicalInformationProductHe: Banner technical information exclusive to the WEB (list that appears in the banner, separated by ',')
